BadgeDetail.Name: Altruism
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated their altruism to improve the welfare of others. This could be by caring for someone, learning sign language to communicate with someone.

Task.Title: Altruism
Task.Body: Describe how you have demonstrated altruism. This could be a brief video or written account. Alternatively, upload a testimonial by someone else describing what you have done that was altruistic.
